Title: Backflash
Writer: Farhad Safinia (creator), Bradford Winters, Angelina Burnett (executive story editor), Kevin J. Hynes (story)
Actors: Kelsey Grammer, Connie Nielsen, Hannah Ware, Jeff Hephner
Plot: Kane's moves with the housing project escalate from a state of unrest to rioting and looting. As Chicago burns, Kane secretly seeks treatment at an alternative clinic where his past haunts ...
